actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
	"itemId" AS value,
	CASE
		WHEN "itemId" = 1 THEN 'Neon (Arch) Green'
		WHEN "itemId" = 2 THEN 'Neon (Arch) Blue'
		WHEN "itemId" = 3 THEN 'Neon (Arch) Red'
		WHEN "itemId" = 4 THEN 'Neon (Arch) Yellow'
		WHEN "itemId" = 5 THEN 'Neon (Arch) Purple'
		WHEN "itemId" = 6 THEN 'Neon (Tribal) Green'
		WHEN "itemId" = 7 THEN 'Neon (Tribal) Blue'
		WHEN "itemId" = 8 THEN 'Neon (Tribal) Red'
		WHEN "itemId" = 9 THEN 'Neon (Tribal) Yellow'
		WHEN "itemId" = 10 THEN 'Neon (Tribal) Purple'
		ELSE '未知底盘灯，请向管理员报告此错误'
	END AS label
FROM public."CarItem"
WHERE "carId" = {{SelectCarId.selectedOptionValue}} AND "category" = 8
UNION

SELECT
    0 AS value,
    '无底盘灯' AS label
ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT pg_sleep(3);
